author: Kenneth Randazzo
comment: Love everything about this watch face besides the fact that I can't chose a 12hr clock. That's a very important option which I don't understand why it has been left out. I'd love to give it 5 stars when the feature is added. [[EDIT]]] The 12hr clock option has been added! 5 stars! Love this clock!

reply.author: Nicolas POMEPUY
reply.content: The new version will use your system settings for the hour format.

title: Thanks for the 12hr clock option.

author: Kevin Lindner
comment: Love the look of the watch face, but the fact that the date does not change, and it is incredibly slow to update the phone battery percentage makes it hard to rate higher than a 2. If these items get fixed, I would easily give it a 5.

author: Marco Pivetta
comment: The refresh rate does not work properly. Today is 20 and the watch was still showing 19. This does not happens with others skins. The app becomes useless.

reply.author: Nicolas POMEPUY
reply.content: Could you please send me a mail with your device model and system version?

title: The refresh rate really sucks

author: Dillon Hildebrant
comment: I love this app but it only gives 24 hr time. For example instead of saying 8:30, it says 20:30.. Id appreciate if you'd fix thanks!
title: 24 hr time only?

author: Omair Shabir
comment: Very good app, however issues with phone battery stats not being updated properly so gets stuck at a percentage and doesn't update the phone battery stat. The watch battery stat works fine. If fixed would get 5 stars. Using with a G Watch (square) UPDATE: Getting issues with the Date also being stuck on 1st Jan please fix!
title: Has bugs

author: Leo Chan
comment: I'm currently experiencing the date constantly being out of sync with my LG G Watch. Other than that the UI is beautiful and doesn't eat much into the battrey
title: Love it but

author: Mark Tadong
comment: Would really love if there's an option to go grayscale on always on/ambient mode and have 12-hour clock more(after all, this is a watch face and being able to choose the prefered time format is very important). Having premium version of battery stats is an added bonus because you don't need to look at your phone to check on wear battery and it also have time prediction albeit it's not very accurate.
title: It's okay-some annoying limitations

author: Paul Bogema
comment: I love this watch face and its currently among my favorites, but it really needs a 12 hour option
title: Amazing but lacks 12 hour

author: Alex Shield
comment: Downloaded this yesterday and it still does not show on my phone or watch even though it has had all night to sync  UPDATE: After talking to the dev, it is now working perfectly and I love the customisation options

reply.author: Nicolas POMEPUY
reply.content: Could you please try to force a synchronization in the Android Wear app?

title: Looks great... In the pictures

author: Boye Oshin
comment: With the new update, the badges don't render correctly (as shown in the product page). They are lower and obscured by the 360's "flat tire".

reply.author: Nicolas POMEPUY
reply.content: Thanks for the report. Could you send me a screenshot or a photo by email?

title: Update doesn't render correctly on Moto 360

author: Hex DSL
comment: Now it has digital Watch face its fab.   If I could change anything I would like separate set of colors for ambient mode and the ability to hide badges in ambient
title: Nice.

author: Mathieu Boyer
comment: The update added a lot of useful stuff. I like the new badges and the phone battery line additions. Keep going like this!
title: Great functionality

author: Emil C
comment: How do i change the ambient band color? Its pretty thick and white eats battery

author: Nathen C
comment: better now that i can use it :)

reply.author: Nicolas POMEPUY
reply.content: Hi, As explained in the description, the watchface will only show on Android Lollipop. I hope you will like it when you will get the update (and you will change your rating accordingly).

title: Sony Smartwatch 3

author: Joe Shaw
comment: Excellent App!
title: Excellent Dev!

author: Jonathan Stinebaugh
comment: It sometimes does not sync correctly with the battery time in the battery stats app resulting minor confusion
title: Awesome buuut

author: Omar McFarlane
comment: One of my instant favs.

author: Ferric Foxide
comment: I absolutely love this. The themeability, various color selections, and full utilization of square faces is the exact thing I was looking for in a face for my GW.  The only things I could want out of it are toggles for bigger cards and for animations off, to make it perfect. Edit: Awesome Dev too! Added the animation toggle within a day or two of asking. Wishing I could rate over 5 for this. Thanks!

reply.author: Nicolas POMEPUY
reply.content: Thanks a lot for the feedback and support. I will take a look at your propositions.

title: Far and away the best square analog face

author: Jim Thibault
comment: I want to use Digital Watch Faces only, can not easy tell the time when the watch is dimmed with an Analog Watch Face.

reply.author: Nicolas POMEPUY
reply.content: In the smartphone's configuration screen, you can switch it to the system clock which is a digital clock if you want.

title: Will likely not use it

author: Amir GH
comment: I got this watch face and i can't see it on my watch. Doesn't show anything

reply.author: Nicolas POMEPUY
reply.content: Does it appear in the Android Wear app on your smartphone?

title: Didn't work on g watch R with android 5.0.1

author: Benoît `BoD` Lubek
comment: The battery indicator is useful and looks good at the same time. I like the customization options as well. Very well done!
title: Sleek!

author: Maxime Dupierreux
comment: One of the most beautiful watchface is also one of most useful. Great work !
title: Great !

author: Aladin Q
comment: Waiting for the OTA to roll out to use it.
title: Looks promising.
